item.content:encoded: I just noticed in the iTunes feed, that it is your last episode 🙁 It was a great journey to listen to your podcast and I wish You all the best!

item.title: Comment on The Final Whispers – Episode 140 by Howard Marks
item.dc:creator: Howard Marks
item.description: There's a sad sort of clanging from the clock in the hall And the bells in the steeple too And up in the nursery an absurd little bird Is popping out to say cuckoo (cuckoo, cuckoo) Regretfully they tell us, but firmly they compel us to say goodnight To you So long Farewell Auf wiedersehen Good night
item.content:encoded:
There’s a sad sort of clanging from the clock in the hall
And the bells in the steeple too
And up in the nursery an absurd little bird
Is popping out to say cuckoo (cuckoo, cuckoo)
Regretfully they tell us, but firmly they compel us to say goodnight
To you
So long
Farewell
Auf wiedersehen
Good night

item.title: Comment on What a Long Strange Trip It’s Been by Alex Muetstege - VMGuru
item.dc:creator: Alex Muetstege - VMGuru
item.description:
Hey guys, I've been enjoying Geek Whisperers for quite some time. Knowing at least 2 of you in person, I'm sure neither of you would have predicted where it all would lead. It's been an exciting ride, that's certain.
Having said that, I hope to see you all again on one of the many events in the world we might attend. Until then, thanks for all the fish
Greetz,
Alex
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys,
I’ve been enjoying Geek Whisperers for quite some time. Knowing at least 2 of you in person, I’m sure neither of you would have predicted where it all would lead. It’s been an exciting ride, that’s certain.

Having said that, I hope to see you all again on one of the many events in the world we might attend. Until then, thanks for all the fish

Greetz,

Alex
